      * 1 <= capacity <= 10

  const dp_next = grid.map((row, i) => row.reduce((x, c) => c? x + 1 : 0, 0))
  const result = dp.filter(x => x!== dp_next.filter(x => x === 0).length).reduce((x, y) => x + y, 0)
